alert.note: Alert for Outagamie; Shawano; Waupaca (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 11:06AM CDT until May 07 at 3:04PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Wolf River near Shiocton affecting Waupaca, Outagamie and Shawano Counties. For the Lower Wolf River...including Shiocton...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Wolf River near Shiocton. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, there is minor flooding in the Shiocton area including the city park and boat landing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 11.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage by this evening, and continue to slowly fall throughout next week. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight.
